page.title: 20Playground games in St Ives.
page.content: The games children play in 1985,aren't just computer games they are......... Bulldog,hopscotch,football,tennis,walk ing and talking,off ground tig and genarally mucking around.....in fact they're much the same as those our mums and dads played when they were young.Girls tend to mix in with boys because they like all sorts of games and play them whether boys are playing them or not. Bulldog is a very popular game with primary schools.1 person is it and he choses a person to run,and that person has to try to get to the other side without being caught.If that person does get to the other side he shouts "BULLDOG" and when he does so the other people run. If one person gets tug he has to be it for the next game.The game goes on until there's only one person left to run.He wins the game.
